text:
@CNN They are pushing that he mentioned it in the SOTU address?
In the middle of that PR gong show he spent way more time awarding the Presidential Medal of Freedom to racist/birther Limbaugh than he did to Coronavirus.
Here's the actual 10 seconds.

https://t.co/zGrJlXK8KM
